channel.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
channel.description:
I can't get server, cache and client to work in an offline mode, still. I've downloaded and ran the mopar client 3.2 at a click of a button in offline mode. is there a runescape client that does the same as the 3.2 client but todays version of runescape? i have very poor programing knowlege and I would pay someone to have me a runescape client that will simply launch on a double click and it would be in local host and it's the runescape source or near as damnit.
if this is even possible.

item.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
item.dc:creator: @chrisbevan chrisbevan
item.description:
@chrisbevan wrote:

okay, I was just curious if there was a moparclient 3.2 but for 614/725 client build in offline mode. no worries

Read full topic
item.source: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?

item.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If you’re looking to create your own private server, please look through this board until you find something to your liking. If you have any questions along the way, such as encountering a problem you don’t know how to fix, please make a single thread in this section for server-related issues, and this section for client-related issues.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?

item.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
item.dc:creator: @chrisbevan chrisbevan
item.description:
@chrisbevan wrote:

the open client can it be like verion 614 or 725 though? if it can then is there people here capable of making a client and source combined on a localhost?

Read full topic
item.source: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?

item.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

We don’t have the most recent revision. You could get the newest one available, then actually code the things in yourself and do it that way, but besides that, no.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?

item.title: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

No, it isn’t possible yet. An open client revision for the current RuneScape hasn’t been publicly developed yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I play runescape.com in an offline client?
